name: EnglishAbsoluteValue

Abs02.speech: the absolute value of x plus 1

Abs03.speech: the absolute value of x, plus 1

Abs04.speech: the absolute value of x, plus, the absolute value of y, is greater than or equal to, the absolute value of z

AbsEnd01.speech: the absolute value of x, end absolute value

AbsEnd02.speech: the absolute value of x plus 1, end absolute value

AbsEnd03.speech: the absolute value of x, end absolute value, plus 1

AbsEnd04.speech: the absolute value of x, end absolute value, plus, the absolute value of y, end absolute value, is greater than or equal to, the absolute value of z, end absolute value

AbsDet01.speech: the determinant of the 2 by 2 matrix. Row 1: 2, 1 Row 2: 7, 5

AbsDet02.speech: the determinant of the 3 by 3 matrix. Row 1: 2, 4, 1 Row 2: 3, 5, 2 Row 3: 1, 4, 7

AbsDet03.speech: the determinant of the 4 by 4 matrix. Row 1: Column 1, 0; Column 2, 3; Column 3, 4; Column 4, 3. Row 2: Column 1, 2; Column 2, 1; Column 3, 0; Column 4, 9. Row 3: Column 1, 3; Column 2, 0; Column 3, 2; Column 4, 1. Row 4: Column 1, 6; Column 2, 2; Column 3, 9; Column 4, 0

AbsDet04.speech: the determinant of the 2 by 2 matrix. Row 1: Column 1, 2; Column 2, 1. Row 2: Column 1, 7; Column 2, 5 plus x

AbsDet05.speech: the determinant of the 2 by 2 matrix. Row 1: 2 x, 1 Row 2: 7, 5

AbsDet06.speech: the determinant of the 2 by 2 matrix. Row 1: 2 x, y Row 2: one half, two thirds

AbsDet07.speech: the determinant of the 2 by 2 matrix. Row 1: one half, two thirds Row 2: three fourths, one fifth

AbsDet08.speech: the determinant of the 2 by 2 matrix. Row 1: 2, 1 Row 2: 7, 5

AbsDet09.speech: the determinant of the 3 by 3 matrix. Row 1: 2, 4, 1 Row 2: 3, 5, 2 Row 3: 1, 4, 7

AbsDet10.speech: the determinant of the 4 by 4 matrix. Row 1: Column 1, 0; Column 2, 3; Column 3, 4; Column 4, 3. Row 2: Column 1, 2; Column 2, 1; Column 3, 0; Column 4, 9. Row 3: Column 1, 3; Column 2, 0; Column 3, 2; Column 4, 1. Row 4: Column 1, 6; Column 2, 2; Column 3, 9; Column 4, 0

AbsDet11.speech: the determinant of the 2 by 2 matrix. Row 1: Column 1, 2; Column 2, 1. Row 2: Column 1, 7; Column 2, 5 plus x

AbsDet12.speech: the determinant of the 2 by 2 matrix. Row 1: 2 x, 1 Row 2: 7, 5

AbsDet13.speech: the determinant of the 2 by 2 matrix. Row 1: 2 x, y Row 2: one half, two thirds

AbsDet14.speech: the determinant of the 2 by 2 matrix. Row 1: one half, two thirds Row 2: three fourths, one fifth
